entry.title: Major Ethereum Mining Pools Will Back ETHW Mining
entry.summary: F2Pool, Poolin, BTC.com and Nanopool will support EthereumPoW after the merge.

entry.title: What the Ethereum Merge Means for Ordinary Users—And What It Doesn’t
entry.summary: Ethereum is going to be different. But what exactly does that mean to you? Find out here.

entry.title: 'Proof of Merge' NFTs Will Transform in Your Wallet as the Ethereum Merge Happens
entry.summary: Michael Blau and Mason Hall of a16z whipped up the dynamic NFT and its smart contract in just a few days.

entry.title: Ethereum Classic Hash Rate Soars as Merge Nears and Miners Roam
entry.summary: As Ethereum moves to a proof-of-stake blockchain, mining activity on the ETH alternative Ethereum Classic has reached an all-time high.

entry.title: Treasury Blacklists Bitcoin Addresses Linked to Iranian Ransomware Group
entry.summary: Alleged hackers tied to the Iranian military have been sanctioned by the U.S. government, which blacklisted their BTC addresses.

entry.title: The Ethereum Merge Is Tonight—Here’s How to Watch Live
entry.summary: Want to follow along with the Ethereum community? The Ethereum Foundation will host a livestream tonight.

entry.title: Ethereum Price Flat as Merge Event Is Hours Away
entry.summary: With less than 24 hours to go until the scheduled merge event, the price of Ethereum is largely trading sideways.

entry.title: NFT Renting Platform Shuts Down, Citing 'Close to Zero Traction'
entry.summary: Despite attempts to secure fresh funding and pivot to new targets, NFT renting platform Rentable is today shuttering operations.

entry.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 2: Who Cares About the Ethereum Merge?
entry.summary: The Ethereum merge will happen this week. In this serving of Decrypt-O's, Kate Irwin explains the Bellatrix upgrade and the shadow fork, Dan Roberts predicts the impact Ethereum's move to proof of stake will have on Bitcoin's energy use PR problem (plus commentary from Dan Held from the gm podcast), and Sander Lutz hits the street in Hollyweird to ask regular folks if they know and care about the merge. (Production by Zack Edelman, editing by Jason Nelson.)

entry.title: $70M Art Collection at MoMA To Be Sold, Proceeds Could Fund NFT Buys
entry.summary: Works by Picasso, Bacon, Rousseau and Renoir will be auctioned off to expand the museum’s digital presence, including the possible purchase of NFTs.

entry.title: Bitcoin Tumbles 9% On The Day Amid Inflation Fears
entry.summary: The price of Bitcoin has dropped by around 9% in the past 24 hours, once again wiping out most of its recent gains.

entry.title: South Korean Authorities Issue Arrest Warrant for Terra Co-Founder Do Kwon
entry.summary: South Korean court has issued an arrest warrant for Do Kwon, a co-founder of Terra, accusing him of violating capital market rules.

entry.title: ‘WAGMI’ Is Dead: Pplpleasr, UnicornDAO, TIME President Weigh in on NFTs
entry.summary: The “Future of NFTs” panel at SALT offered a sobering look at the NFT bear market and the Ethereum Merge.

entry.title: Maker Raises Staked Ethereum Limit to Reduce Reliance on USDC
entry.summary: The crypto lender looks to build its vault collateral while moving away from centralized stablecoins.

entry.title: How the Ethereum Merge Ends the Environmental Debate About NFTs
entry.summary: Ethereum is set to transition to proof of stake, which means the biggest network for NFTs will become environmentally friendly.

entry.title: Treasury Won’t Punish Dusted Celebs, Will Allow Users to Recover Funds From Tornado Cash
entry.summary: Dissemination of the mixing tool’s open source code is also legal, regulators say.

entry.title: Doodles Ethereum NFT Sales Surge 1,200% After Big Raise Values Project at $704M
entry.summary: Sales are skyrocketing after Reddit co-founder Alexis Ohanian led a funding round in the Pharrell Williams-backed NFT project.

entry.title: Justin Trudeau Slams Conservative Rival’s 'Irresponsible' Bitcoin Views
entry.summary: Pierre Poilievre recently won the Conservative Party leadership, and Canadian Prime Minister Trudeau is wasting no time taking aim at his opponent's position on Bitcoin.

entry.title: BitGo Sues Novogratz’s Galaxy Digital for $100M After Scrapped Acquisition
entry.summary: The digital asset custodian wants Galaxy Digital to pay up after terminating its planned purchase.

entry.title: Charles Schwab, Citadel and Fidelity Launch EDX Crypto Exchange
entry.summary: EDX Markets plans to offer “safer, faster and more efficient cryptocurrency trading.”

entry.title: Linux Foundation's Announces Open-Source Digital Wallet Initiative, May Include Crypto
entry.summary: The Linux Foundation's initiative aims to open-source digital wallet development, including those that would use cryptocurrencies.

entry.title: Reddit's Ohanian, FTX Ventures Join $54M Raise in NFT Project Doodles
entry.summary: The Doodles NFT project has now hit a $704 million valuation following the latest fundraise.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Drop 5% in an Hour Amid Hot US Inflation Figures
entry.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum both slumped after the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics released its latest CPI figures.

entry.title: You Can Now Earn Bitcoin By Surfing the Web on Chrome, Brave, and More
entry.summary: Slice’s browser extension has implemented Zebedee’s tech to pay users BTC for viewing ads.

entry.title: ‘Still in Research Mode’ With Web3, NFTs Says Ubisoft CEO Yves Guillemot
entry.summary: Ubisoft faced backlash for adding NFTs to Ghost Recon Breakpoint, but CEO Yves Guillemot says the company is still refining its Web3 pivot.

entry.title: Opera Crypto Browser Integrates MetaMask Ahead of Ethereum Merge
entry.summary: Opera has rolled out a major upgrade of its Web3-centric web browser, adding a slate of new features.

entry.title: Abra to Launch US Chartered Bank, Crypto Yield Accounts
entry.summary: With an expected launch date in the U.S. slated for Q1 2023, Abra Bank will soon offer trading, custody, and NFT services to Americans.

entry.title: Alleged Bitcoin Launderer 'Razzlekhan' Wants Access to Crypto Wallets for Tax Purposes
entry.summary: Heather “Razzlekhan” Morgan, an individual with alleged ties to the 2016 Bitfinex hack, has requested access to her crypto for tax purposes.

entry.title: Solana Jumps 7% as Crypto 'Hotspot' Project Helium Eyes Merge
entry.summary: With the Helium community eyeing a merge of its operations to Solana, SOL has jumped around 7% over the past 24 hours.

entry.title: Ethereum Fork EthereumPoW Announces Post-Merge Launch Plans
entry.summary: The proof-of-work blockchain looks to continue the Ethereum legacy of profitable mining.

entry.title: Terra Falls Back Down to Earth: LUNA Sinks 38% From Recent High
entry.summary: Terra has lost steam after last week’s sudden surge, but both LUNA and LUNA Classic are still way up in price over the last week.

entry.title: Fidelity Is Considering Offering Bitcoin to Retail Investors: WSJ
entry.summary: Teased by Galaxy Digital CEO Mike Novogratz, the wealth management giant is mulling a deeper dive into crypto.

entry.title: Ethereum Mining Alternative Ravencoin Jumps 85% Ahead of the Merge
entry.summary: The flurry of activity comes as FTX announces a new RVN futures offering.

entry.title: Ex-Coinbase Product Manager's Brother Pleads Guilty in Crypto Insider Trading Case
entry.summary: Former Coinbase staffer Ishan Wahi previously pled not guilty, but his brother appears to have told a different story.

entry.title: Bored Ape NFT Metaverse Band Taps Beyoncé, Bruno Mars Producers
entry.summary: Universal Music Group’s Kingship just recruited a couple of massive hitmakers in the form of Hit-Boy and James Fauntleroy.

entry.title: Ethereum Merge Could Drive Up Institutional Adoption: Bank of America
entry.summary: The merge will make Ethereum more energy efficient, and Bank of America researchers say this could increase interest from institutions.

entry.title: Leading Derivatives Exchange CME Group Launches Ethereum Options
entry.summary: In order to meet surging interest in Ethereum derivatives, CME Group is rolling out an options product for the number two cryptocurrency.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange Huobi to Delist 7 Privacy Coins, Citing ‘Latest Financial Regulations’
entry.summary: Seychelles-based crypto exchange Huobi plans to delist seven privacy-centric cryptocurrencies, including Monero and Zcash.

entry.title: Starbucks Taps Ethereum Scaling Network Polygon for NFT Rewards
entry.summary: The coffee giant plans to both give out and sell digital stamps that can unlock perks like exclusive merch, private events, and trips.

entry.title: 'Everything's Down This Year': FTX Founder SBF
entry.summary: The heavyweight CEO of crypto exchange FTX Sam Bankman-Fried also struck a balanced perspective on the debate over regulatory oversight.

entry.title: Tron Taps Crypto Market Maker Wintermute to Become Official Partner
entry.summary: As Tron’s official market maker, Wintermute will be responsible for creating liquid TRX markets and supporting the network’s DeFi activity.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: The Ethereum Merge
entry.summary: The Ethereum Merge to Proof of Stake (PoS) is one of the most significant technological upgrades in recent history. But why evolve Ethereum at all? Learn the difference between PoW and PoS, why PoS will decrease Ethereum’s carbon footprint by 99.95%, and more in the Infura Web3 Dev Series: The Merge Explained. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: What the Ethereum Merge Means for NFTs
entry.summary: The years-anticipated Ethereum Merge is less than a week away. Everyone is buzzing about what it will mean for the crypto market and for proof of work vs proof of stake, but what will the effect be on NFTs? Dan Roberts, Andrew Hayward, Kate Irwin and Sander Lutz break it down in our latest live roundtable.

entry.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 1: Tornado Cash Privacy Fears, Bored Ape VMAs Hate, Sheriff Gensler
entry.summary: Eat your Decrypt-O’s! In the debut episode, Sander Lutz hits the street to ask people about their privacy concerns in the wake of the government’s Tornado Cash crackdown; Kate Irwin shares headlines on the wackiest Web3 stories, from Crypto.com sending a woman $10 million by accident to Eminem and Snoop Dogg getting Twitter hate for their Bored Apes; and Dan Roberts serves up a rant about Gary Gensler. (Production and editing by Zack Edelman.)

entry.title: gm: Bitcoiner Dan Held Talks Ethereum Merge, PoW vs PoS, and NFTs
entry.summary: Dan Held is an old-school Bitcoiner who has been in the space since the very beginning; he sold his price app ZeroBlock to Blockchain.info in 2013. But while he's largely seen as a Bitcoin maximalist by his half a million fans on Twitter, he tells Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott he's a "permissive" and "open-minded" Bitcoiner: he's watching the Ethereum Merge closely, and he admits Ethereum's move to proof of stake will put pressure on Bitcoin's energy use. Watch Episode 18 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: Ethereum Merge Is on the Horizon
entry.summary: Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, Jason Nelson, and Sander Lutz break down all the angles, from the timing to the expected market reaction to the technical elements.

entry.title: VCs and Family Offices Go Crypto: Hashed, Lux, Cleo, RW3 and Protofund at Crypto Bahamas
entry.summary: Baek Kim of Hashed, Grace Isford of Lux Capital, Sarah Kunst of Cleo Capital, Peter Najarian of RW3 Ventures, and Edward Moncada of Protofund talk to Decrypt's Dan Roberts onstage at FTX's Crypto Bahamas event about VCs and family offices allocating money into crypto and the outlook for institutional DeFi.

entry.title: From Silk Road to Buying ETH: How Musician Tycho Went Crypto
entry.summary: Scott Hansen aka Tycho, the musician, producer, and songwriter, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin how he caught the crypto bug and why he believes Web3 can change the music industry for the better.

entry.title: gm: Decentralized Pictures CEO on How Web3 Can Change Hollywood
entry.summary: Decentralized Pictures, the nonprofit co-founded by Roman Coppola, is enabling on-chain voting to greenlight and fund film projects. CEO Leo Matchett tells Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves how the anti-crypto stigma in Hollywood is fading, how Web3 can bring more diversity to the film world and disrupt the traditional gatekeepers, and how he first got into crypto when he and Coppola set up a Bitcoin miner in an empty sound stage.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is a Node?
entry.summary: In this video, we’ll learn about a core component that defines Web3: blockchain nodes. A node is one of the many computers that power a decentralized network like Ethereum. Learn about the different types of nodes and why they’re part of the core infrastructure that make Web3 possible. Visit Infura.io today to start building. Written by: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.
